医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
基于家庭的生活方式干预措施可以减轻体重和心血管风险在印度进行的家庭干预措施的生活方式干预计划（多产）研究计划，旨在评估具有早产冠心病家族史的人群中基于家庭的生活方式方法是否可以改善体重管理和与肥胖有关的健康状况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/family-base--pable--pablecroce-to-lifestyle-interventions-weight-weight-weight-and-weight-and-cardiovascular-risks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/family-base--pable--pablecret-to-lifestyle-interventions--REDECES-weight-weight-and-and-cardiovascular-risks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A70AD72A-C090-459D-A761-8D420CB6EBFB Mon, 24 Mar 2025 21:30:00 -0400 Family-based approach to lifestyle interventions can reduce weight and cardiovascular risks
长期吸入的皮质类固醇与COPD患者的健康风险增加有关吸入皮质类固醇（ICS）通常用于慢性阻塞性肺疾病（COPD），但不建议作为一线治疗，除非患者哮喘/COPD重叠或频繁加重。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/Long-term-inhaled-corticosteroids-linked-to-increased-health-risks-in-COPD-patients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/Long-term-inhaled-corticosteroids-linked-to-increased-health-risks-in-COPD-patients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2695ED65-AE9F-4F2B-A27E-933AE-933AE4C1AAB4 Mon, 24 Mar 2025 21:25:56 -0400 Long-term inhaled corticosteroids linked to increased health risks in COPD patients
科学家发现M6a在前列腺癌进展中的作用加州大学洛杉矶分校卫生的科学家乔森森综合癌症中心和多伦多大学揭示了RNA中的微小化学修饰（称为M6A）如何在前列腺癌的进展中起着至关重要的作用，包括推动其某些最危险的疾病形式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/scientist-uncover-uncover-role-f-m6a-in-prostate-cancer-progression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/scientists-uncover-uncover-role-of-m6a-in-prostate-cancer-progression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7AAD84DD-0532-4A07-4A07-AE76-BC92110DFC89 Mon, 24 Mar 2025 21:22:38 -0400 Scientists uncover role of m6A in prostate cancer progression
研究人员开发了TIM-3诱饵，以增强B-ALL肿瘤的CAR-T治疗效果B细胞急性淋巴细胞白血病（B-All）是一种威胁生命且高度侵略性的血液癌。它是最常见的儿童癌症，占儿科癌症病例的35％，但可能会影响任何年龄的人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/researchers-develop-tim-3-decoy-tim-3-decoy-to-enhance-car-t-therapy-therapy-therapy-seffective-for-b-all-tumors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/researchers-develop-develop-tim-3-decoy-to-to-enhance-to-enhance-car-t-therapy-therapy-therapy-effective for-b-all-bl-all-tumors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=41323AAB-9FE4-4F5A-88FB-757EF62333EFFB Mon, 24 Mar 2025 21:16:49 -0400 Researchers develop TIM-3 decoy to enhance CAR-T therapy effectiveness for B-ALL tumors
在家中进行的基于气味的测试可以预测老年人的认知障碍在早期发现认知障碍时，一项新研究表明鼻子知道。大规模杨百翰的研究人员开发了嗅觉测试，参与者嗅探气味标签已放在卡片上，以评估人们歧视，识别和记住气味的能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/Smell-based-test-taken-at-home-could-predict-cognitive-impairment-in-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/smell asmell op-test-test-taken-taken--home-could-could-cognity-cognitive-cognitive-cognitive-inder--in grod-ind grod-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3df555691-8456-4012-91fa-15E72CCC793C Mon, 24 Mar 2025 21:12:03 -0400 Smell-based test taken at home could predict cognitive impairment in older adults
关于睡眠如何重新组织神经元活动以获得更好记忆的新见解为什么睡眠对学习和记忆如此重要？奥地利科学技术研究所（ISTA）的CSICSVARI小组的神经科学家通过监测大鼠大脑中的神经元活动的新见解，在空间学习后最多20个小时的睡眠。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/new-insights-into-how-how-sleep-reorganizes-neuronal-neuronal-acterivity-for for-better-memory.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/new-insights-into-how-how-sleep-reorganizes-neuronal-neuronal-activity-for for-better-memory.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A963C51F-9CE8-4232-B2E3-77394CC8F70A Mon, 24 Mar 2025 21:06:00 -0400 New insights into how sleep reorganizes neuronal activity for better memory
新型的长效避孕植入物可以通过微小的针头传递大规模的杨百翰和麻省理工学院调查人员开发了一种长效避孕植入物，可以通过微小的针头传递，以最大程度地减少患者的不适感并增加使用药物的可能性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/novel-long-acting-contraceptive-mplant-ractive-mplant-can-be-be-be-be-be-be-through-through-tiny-nyedles.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/novel-long-acting-contraceptive-mplant-mplant-can-be-be-be-be-be-be-be-through-through-tiny-nyedles.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=998482c2-a142-4342-b5f7-4fd100f9c77a Mon, 24 Mar 2025 20:58:02 -0400 Novel long-acting contraceptive implant can be delivered through tiny needles
新的染色质跟踪方法在高分辨率中解锁DNA循环过程在生命的众多奇迹中，该细胞有分裂的能力，从而使生物体能够生长和更新。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/new-Chromatin-tracing-method-unlocks-dna-looping-process-process-rocess-in-resolution.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/new-cromatin-tracing-method-method-unlocks-dna-looping-process-process-process-in-high-ingresolution.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bf914A08-F157-4741-9975-2C50D4ABA298 Mon, 24 Mar 2025 20:51:00 -0400 New chromatin tracing method unlocks DNA looping process in high resolution
生酮饮食将与肥胖相关的生物衰老逆转6年以上肥胖在分子水平上加快了生物衰老的速度，但是这项研究发现非常低的生酮饮食（VLCKD）可以显着扭转这种影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/ketogenic-diet-reverses-biesity-link---------------------------- biological-biological-biological-biological-aging-aging-by-over-over-over-over-over-over-asss.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/ketogenic-diet-revers--rink------------------------------------------＃biological-biological-biological-aging-aging-aging-by-over-over-over-over-over-over-over-over-over-6年https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8e276c8a-1790-490-49b1-a207-A207-A1BF888059EC0 Mon, 24 Mar 2025 20:46:00 -0400 Ketogenic diet reverses obesity-linked biological aging by over 6 years
UZH研究人员开发诱饵分子以恢复免疫防御免疫系统缺陷使受影响的个体容易受到严重病毒疾病的影响，例如流感或Covid-19。它是由人体自身抗体引起的，该抗体抑制了称为I型干扰素的重要防御蛋白。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/uzh-researchers-develop-develop-decoy-molecules-to-restore-molecules-to-restore-mmmune-defense.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/uzh-researchers-develop-develop-decoy-molecules-to-restore-molecules-to-restore-mmmune-defense.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=960AA7E2-4605-4605-44B7-90A4-7C252525B13523 Mon, 24 Mar 2025 20:45:00 -0400 UZH researchers develop decoy molecules to restore immune defense
